data.title: Kalanga Dictionary
data.text:
This Kalanga dictionary was compiled by Joyce Mathangwane in 1994 and is made available through the CBOLD project, where a TXT file of this material can be downloaded. For any use of this material, please see CBOLD and the Bantuists’ Manifesto.
